#:stopdoc:
module TMail
  module Base64

    module_function

    def folding_encode( str, eol = "\n", limit = 60 )
      [str].pack('m')
    end

    def encode( str )
      [str].pack('m').tr( "\r\n", '' )
    end

    def decode( str, strict = false )
      str.unpack('m').first
    end

  end
end
#:startdoc:
